title: Linguine with spicy pumpkin seed pesto
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons shelled pumpkin seeds', '2 green peppers', '3 green chillies, or to taste', 'handful chopped fresh coriander', '3 cloves garlic', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', '1 (500g) pack linguine pasta', '250g (9 oz) halved cherry tomatoes', '1 lemon, wedged']
